code: import React,{useState}from'react';import Car from'../Car/Car';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./carsList.css';import Filters from'../Filters/Filters';import Search from'../Search/Search';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CarList=_ref=>{let{cars}=_ref;const[filteredCars,setFilteredCars]=useState([]);const[searchQuery,setSearchQuery]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleShowMore=car=>{navigate("/catalog/carPage",{state:{car}});};const handleSearch=event=>{const query=event.target.value.toLowerCase();setSearchQuery(query);const filtered=cars.filter(car=>car.name.toLowerCase().includes(query)||car.description.toLowerCase().includes(query));setFilteredCars(filtered);};const handleApplyFilters=filters=>{const newFilteredCars=cars.filter(car=>car.price<=filters.maxPrice);setFilteredCars(newFilteredCars);};const displayedCars=filteredCars.length>0||searchQuery?filteredCars:cars;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Search,{onSearch:handleSearch}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Filters,{onClick:handleApplyFilters})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"car-list",children:displayedCars.map((car,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Car,{...car,onShowMore:()=>handleShowMore(car)},car.id||index))})]});};export default CarList;
